text:
@TheRickWilson To the Trump Admin: For coronavirus, take Trump's cocktail: A 45 Special.
4.5 parts bleach
4.5 parts hydroxychloroquine 
4.5 parts UV rays
 Take it. Inject it. Shine it up your butt.
"It's a beautiful thing; a gift from heaven." 
Then you die.
